competitions.title: BELKA — Big Encoded Library for Chemical Assessment
competitions.description: Predict interactions between small molecules and protein targets using large-scale chemical datasets. The task focuses on binary or multi-class classification of molecular binding affinity.

competitions.title: FAIR Universe – the challenge of handling uncertainties in fundamental science NeurIPS 2024 Competition Proposal
competitions.description: Develop models that rank predictions under uncertainty, emphasizing probabilistic calibration and ordered evaluation of outputs in scientific simulation tasks.

competitions.title: HAC — The Hacker-Cup AI Competition
competitions.description: Build AI systems capable of generating correct programmatic solutions to coding challenges. Submissions are evaluated by running generated code against hidden test cases.

competitions.title: Weather4cast 2024 – Multi-task Challenges for Rain Movie Prediction on the Road to Hi-Res Foundation Models
competitions.description: Forecast high-resolution spatiotemporal precipitation maps from meteorological data. The task involves pixel-level prediction similar to image segmentation or dense regression.
